lost.IEM: IEC:WS0080010001:The cluster has lost $host server. System is running in degraded mode.

member.IEM: IEC:IS0080020001:Server $host has joined back the cluster. System is restored.

stop.IEM: IEC:WS0080030002:IO services of <HOST1> are being stopped on $host.

start.IEM: IEC:IS0080030001:IO services of <HOST1> are being started on $host.

stop.IEM: IEC:WS0080030002:IO services of <HOST2> are being stopped on $host.

start.IEM: IEC:IS0080030001:IO services of <HOST2> are being started on $host.
